title: Tropical north
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and John Martin-Jones
brief_description: Life and work in the tropical areas of northern Queensland. Dense jungle provides a spectacle for the tourist and a challenge for the settler. Shows industries such as sugar-growing and timber-cutting, and the thriving city of Cairns. Commentator: Richard Davies
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and John Martin-Jones
